title: 刚开始玩json，不知道哪里出错了
author: Ksieus
txt_content:
求大佬解答
tellraw @a {"text":"test1","color":"dark_purple","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/tellraw @a {\"text\":\"test2\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/tellraw @a {\\\"text\\\":\\\"test3\\\",\\\"clickEvent\\\":{\\\"action\\\":\\\"run_command\\\",\\\"value\\\":\\\"GG\\\"}}\"}}"}}
